flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to buy 60*0.6=<<60*0.6=36>>36 pounds
So he needs to buy 36/2=<<36/2=18>>18 weight plates
That would cost 18*5=$18*5=90>>90
Since he bought more than 10 he gets a discount so he gets 90*0.2=$90*0.2=18>>18 off.
That means he paid 90-18=$90-18=69>>69
#### 69

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 69. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
